source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000010_EMETSELCH<tab>And lo, vile beasts did rise...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000010_EMETSELCH<tab>見よ  獣は解き放たれた

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000020_EMETSELCH<tab>Leaving naught in their wake but blood and ash.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000020_EMETSELCH<tab>それらは人々を殺し  街を焼いた

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000030_EMETSELCH<tab>Sun scorches earth and boils seas...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000030_EMETSELCH<tab>明日は燃え殻となり塵となった

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000040_EMETSELCH<tab>And our sins ascend unto the heavens─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000040_EMETSELCH<tab>滅びは影のように速い

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000050_EMETSELCH<tab>Three dooms to unmake all we were.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000050_EMETSELCH<tab>すべてが失われようとしていた――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000060_ALISAIE<tab>The sky burns. The Final Days...are truly upon us.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000060_ALISAIE空が、燃えてる……
本当に……終末が来たんだわ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000070_AWAHEEN<tab>...My friends. I trust you have heard the news.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000070_AWAHEEN皆さん……！
報告をお聞きいただけたのですね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000080_ALPHINAUD<tab>We have. What can you tell us of the situation, Your Excellency?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000080_ALPHINAUDええ……。
アヒワーン殿、状況を詳しく教えていただけますか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000090_AWAHEEN<tab>Last night, the isle was rocked by tremors, and the earth itself cried out.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000090_AWAHEEN昨夜のこと、悲鳴とも地鳴りともつかない音が、
島中に響き渡りました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000100_AWAHEEN<tab>Aloft, the heavens began to burn. From all about, unholy beasts─the likes of which we had never seen─came forth in fury and rage.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000100_AWAHEEN間もなく空が燃えだした。
それに前後して、見たこともないような獣が現れ、
暴れはじめたのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000110_AWAHEEN<tab>...No. To say they “came forth” would be...inexact.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000110_AWAHEEN<tab>……いえ、この表現では正しくありませんね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000120_AWAHEEN<tab>The people of Radz-at-Han themselves transformed into these baleful fiends.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000120_AWAHEEN人が突然、転じたのです。
恐るべき異形の獣に。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000130_AWAHEEN<tab>Though the phenomenon was observed throughout our lands, the first creature─the largest and most dreadful of the lot─wrought havoc upon us here, in our fair city.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000130_AWAHEEN異変は島のいたるところで起こっていますが、
ラザハンで最初に確認された、ひときわ強大な獣が、
とくに甚大な被害をもたらしている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000140_AWAHEEN<tab>Though they bear superficial resemblance to divinities of legend, they are ungodly abominations. The people decry them as “blasphemies.”
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000140_AWAHEEN我々はその個体を、神話に登場する人であり獣である神……
「神獣」のまがいものであるとして、
「偽神獣」と名付けました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000150_AWAHEEN<tab>The large one's rampage has since taken it to the northern reaches of the island. I mean to dispatch our Radiant Host in an attempt to quell the threat.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000150_AWAHEEN偽神獣は今、島の北側に回って暴れています。
これより星戦士団を送り込み、討伐を試みるところです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000160_ESTINIEN<tab>And what of Vrtra?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000160_ESTINIEN<tab>ヴリトラの奴はどうしてるんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000170_AWAHEEN<tab>Vrtra, too, makes for the north of his own accord. And yet...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000170_AWAHEEN我々に先駆けて、単身、北側に向かわれました。
しかし……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000180_AWAHEEN<tab>He knows the blasphemy and its minions were but yesterday his beloved people.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000180_AWAHEENヴリトラ様は、偽神獣や獣たちが、
己の愛する領民であったことを心得ていらっしゃいます。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000190_AWAHEEN<tab>I pray his boundless compassion and mercy does not deter him from taking unenviable but necessary action.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000190_AWAHEEN<tab>あのお方の慈悲深さが、命取りにならぬとよいのですが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000200_ALPHINAUD<tab>...Understood. I ask that you allow us to aid you in quelling this threat.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000200_ALPHINAUD状況はわかりました。
偽神獣の討伐作戦、是非、我々にも協力させてください。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000210_AWAHEEN<tab>You would risk your lives to help us yet again? I have no words to express my gratitude.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000210_AWAHEENなんと心強き申し出か……。
深く感謝いたします。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000220_AWAHEEN<tab>Our regiments approach the north from several directions, with a number of units set to depart from the docks of Yedlihmad.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000220_AWAHEEN星戦士団は、複数のルートで島の北側に向かっています。
いくつかの部隊が、ここイェドリマンの船着場から、
船で北上する予定です。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000230_AWAHEEN<tab>They will make landfall in an area of dense jungle, where one can expect to encounter dangers even beyond the fell beasts we hunt.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000230_AWAHEEN「暁」の皆さんも、同様に船で北側にお送りします。
上陸地点には、鬱蒼とした密林が広がっている……
偽神獣以外の獣たちに遭遇する可能性もあるでしょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000240_AWAHEEN<tab>I leave you to your preparation. You will find me at the docks when you are ready to depart.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000240_AWAHEENどうか念入りに戦いのお仕度を。
私は船着場でお待ちしております。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000250_ALISAIE<tab>We're as prepared as we'll ever be. Let's go.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000250_ALISAIE準備ならぬかりないわ。
……行きましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000260_FAKEGODBEAST<tab>Grrraaaoooooohhhhhh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000260_FAKEGODBEAST<tab>ウウウ…アウウ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000270_FAKEGODBEAST<tab>Aaaaaaaaaggghhh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000270_FAKEGODBEAST<tab>アアアアアアッ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000280_FAKEGODBEAST<tab>Rrrrrruuu...ined. I'm...rrruuuined...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000280_FAKEGODBEAST<tab>ショ……カイ……マモ……マ……マモル…………

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000290_YSHTOLA<tab>As I feared...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000290_YSHTOLA<tab>ああ……やっぱり……なんてことなの……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000300_ALPHINAUD<tab>What is it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000300_ALPHINAUD<tab>ヤ・シュトラ……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000310_YSHTOLA<tab>The beast was there...and now it is no more, yes?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000310_YSHTOLAそこに偽神獣がいて、今、消滅した……
そうなんでしょう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000320_THANCRED<tab>Indeed, we saw it plain. But...you didn't, did you?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000320_THANCREDああ、そのとおりだが……
まさか、お前には視えてなかったのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000330_YSHTOLA<tab>I saw nothing. Not the blasphemy that perished here, nor the other men-turned-beasts. And because of this, I now see all too well...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000330_YSHTOLA偽神獣も、ほかの人から転じた獣たちも、
視えないからこそ、視えていたわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000340_YSHTOLA<tab>There is no aether. Where the creatures should be, I saw naught but emptiness...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000340_YSHTOLA……ないのよ、エーテルが。
私の視界だと、空白になっているの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000350_ALPHINAUD<tab>Emptiness? But that would mean...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000350_ALPHINAUD<tab>それは……どういう…………。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000360_YSHTOLA<tab>Recall the words of the watcher. 'Twas a stagnancy of aether─a cessation of flow leading to decay and absence─that led the ancients to conclude their star was dying...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000360_YSHTOLA月の監視者が言っていた言葉……
古代人たちは、天脈が循環不全を起こしている場所から、
星が「腐り始めた」と見たという話……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000370_YSHTOLA<tab>This is the same phenomenon. The instant these people are seized by the transformation, their aether begins to...rot and crumble away like dried mud...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000370_YSHTOLAまさに、そのとおりだったんだわ。
人から獣に転じた瞬間に、エーテルが腐り落ちてしまうのよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000380_YSHTOLA<tab>Until, from their corporeal forms to their very souls, naught remains...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000380_YSHTOLA<tab>身体はもちろん、魂まで……なにひとつ残らずに……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000390_ALISAIE<tab>But the beast spoke with its dying breath! Surely, at least a sliver of the man it was endured!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000390_ALISAIEで、でも、偽神獣は何か言ってるみたいだった……！
人だったころの想いが残ってるってことじゃないの！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000400_YSHTOLA<tab>...Mayhap so. But even if the process was incomplete, 'twas little more than a faint residue.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000400_YSHTOLAそうね、完全に腐り果てるまでならば……。
けれどそれは、消えかけの残滓にすぎないわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000410_ALISAIE<tab>Gods be good... You're saying they cannot be saved?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000410_ALISAIEそんな……。
それじゃあ、もとには戻せないってこと……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000420_YSHTOLA<tab>Not by any means known to me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000420_YSHTOLA<tab>私たちの知っている方法では……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000430_YSHTOLA<tab>...Or by any means at all, like as not. For there is naught left to save.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000430_YSHTOLAいえ、完全に「無」になってしまうのだもの。
恐らくどんな方法をもってしても、戻すことはできないわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000440_GRAHATIA<tab>They return not even to the aetherial sea...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000440_GRAHATIA<tab>星海にすら、還れないのか……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000450_VRITRA<tab>The beasts rage on, their hunger insatiable...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000450_VRITRA<tab>異形の獣たちの勢いが、衰えない……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000460_VRITRA<tab>Even deprived of their master, they perpetuate his legacy of hate.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000460_VRITRA偽神獣が、群れの長たる役目を持つならばあるいはと、
期待したのだが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000470_VRITRA<tab>Once proud sons and daughters of Thavnair, all of them...and now I spill their blood!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000470_VRITRAもとは皆、サベネアの子だった……！
どれだけこの牙に掛けなければならないのだ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000480_AWAHEEN<tab>Vrtra! My friends! I am heartened to see you safe.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000480_AWAHEENヴリトラ様、皆さん！
よくぞご無事で！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000490_ESTINIEN<tab>You put your secret at risk.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000490_ESTINIEN<tab>いいのか、竜の姿を見せて。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000500_AWAHEEN<tab>Those closest to me already know the truth─a truth I must now share with one and all.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000500_AWAHEENええ、彼らは真実を知る、腹心たちです。
何よりも……この秘密はもはや、明かされなければならない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000510_AWAHEEN<tab>...Vrtra. Calamity has come to Radz-at-Han. Our fair nation is rent by screams of pain and despair.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000510_AWAHEEN恐れながらヴリトラ様、
この悪夢の如き災厄を前にして、
ラザハンは悲鳴と慟哭に埋め尽くされております。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000520_AWAHEEN<tab>More than ever, we require a strong leader to shepherd us through the storm. Reveal your true self to our people, Vrtra, and guide us to salvation!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000520_AWAHEEN今こそ、強き太守が必要なのです。
どうか真相を告げ、ヴリトラ様おんみずから、
民を率いてくださいませ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000530_VRITRA<tab>What madness is this, Ahewann? Thou dost forget thyself.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000530_VRITRA何を馬鹿げたことを……
君が動転してどうする、アヒワーン。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000540_VRITRA<tab>Were we to reveal our duplicity, it would do naught but foster confusion and chaos.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000540_VRITRAこの惨劇の中で、太守まで竜であったなどと言い出せば、
民をいっそうの混乱に叩き落とすだけだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000550_VRITRA<tab>Nay, I shall remain the satrap's loyal ally, and do battle with the beasts. Easing hearts and leading the people to safety is thy task, and thine alone.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000550_VRITRA私はこのまま「太守の盟友たる竜」として、
獣たちを掃い続ける。
民に寄り添い、なだめるのは君の役目だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000560_VRITRA<tab>I ask that you remain at Ahewann's side, and render unto him what aid you may.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000560_VRITRAすまないが、「暁」の皆も、
アヒワーンに手を貸してやってほしい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000570_VRITRA<tab>I know not what lies ahead, but without you, Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han will not survive.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000570_VRITRA<tab>この事態を究明し、対策を立てるには、君たちの力が必要だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000580_ESTINIEN<tab>...Take me with you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000580_ESTINIEN<tab>……おい、天竜。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000590_ESTINIEN<tab>I am as at home fighting in the air as I am on land. Take me with you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000590_ESTINIEN俺を連れていけ。
空中戦にも、多少の自信はある。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000600_VRITRA<tab>Were my words unclear? I require no assistance. Thy place is at Ahewann's side.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000600_VRITRA話を聞いていなかったのか？
こちらは私ひとりでいい、
君たちは、アヒワーンを手伝ってくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000610_THANCRED<tab>Estinien─here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000610_THANCRED<tab>エスティニアン、受け取れ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000620_THANCRED<tab>It's the last thing you ever wanted─a linkpearl.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000620_THANCREDお前が面倒くさがって持とうとしなかった、
「暁」のリンクパールだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000630_THANCRED<tab>We'd gain much from knowing your elevated perspective. And it'll keep you from getting lonely─which I know you loathe.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000630_THANCREDヴリトラが別行動するっていうなら、連絡手段がいるだろう？
それを持ったお前がついていれば、俺たちも助かる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000640_ESTINIEN<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000640_ESTINIEN<tab>フッ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000650_ESTINIEN<tab>You heard the man. Seems I'm coming with you after all.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000650_ESTINIEN……だ、そうだ。
観念した方がよさそうだぞ、太守様。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000660_VRITRA<tab>Then I pray thy grip is iron. Be it on thy head if thou dost chance to fall.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000660_VRITRA……加減はしない。
振り落とされても構わないなら、背に乗るがいい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000670_ESTINIEN<tab>Fair enough. Now─shall we?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000670_ESTINIEN上等だ。
さあ、とっとと空を制しに行くぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000680_AWAHEEN<tab>I fear it is as Vrtra says: we will not survive this on our own. While I am loath to impose upon you again...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000680_AWAHEEN申し訳ございません。
ヴリトラ様のおっしゃるとおり、この事態を収めるため、
引き続きご協力いただけるでしょうか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000690_ALPHINAUD<tab>I would insist if you did not. 'Tis the very reason we have come.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000690_ALPHINAUDもちろんです。
私たちは、そのためにこの地へ来たのですから。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000700_AWAHEEN<tab>Then once more I find myself without words to thank you properly. Let us return to the capital and plan our next course of action.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000700_AWAHEEN重ねて感謝を……。
ひとまずは、ラザハンの都まで戻るといたしましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000710_YSHTOLA<tab>There you are. You've spoken with the survivors?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000710_YSHTOLA来ていたのね。
そちらも話を聞いてこられたのかしら。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000720_GRAHATIA<tab>Indeed. We thought to share what we have gleaned, that we might together gain a greater understanding of present circumstances.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000720_GRAHATIAああ、気になるところはおおよそな。
みんなの集めた情報とあわせて、意見をもらいたい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000730_ALPHINAUD<tab>Fortuitous timing. Alisaie and I completed our own investigations not long ago.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000730_ALPHINAUDちょうどいい頃合いだったようだね。
私たちも、ひとまわりしてこられたよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000740_YSHTOLA<tab>Then we should take a moment to compare notes. Shall we begin with the two of you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000740_YSHTOLA<tab>いいわ、じゃあ、あなたたちの報告からお願いできて？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000750_ALPHINAUD<tab>...So the merchant Khalzahl was gravely concerned about his business in the days preceding his untimely end.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000750_ALPHINAUD……つまり、偽神獣になってしまったカルザール氏は、
自身の商会のことで、深く思い悩んでいたわけだね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000760_ALISAIE<tab>The tales we heard were much the same. The first victims to be changed into blasphemies were all overcome with anguish of one manner or another.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000760_ALISAIE私たちが聞いた範囲でも、異形の獣に転じた人は、
直前に強い不安を感じていたみたいだった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000770_ALISAIE<tab>Then those who saw their loved ones stolen before their eyes succumbed to a similar panic, setting in motion a chain of transformations.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000770_ALISAIE獣に追い詰められた人や、
友達が獣になるのを見てしまった人……
そういう人たちが、連鎖的に転じていったそうよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000780_ALPHINAUD<tab>Fear, unease, despair...these negative feelings serve as a catalyst.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000780_ALPHINAUD獣に転じる条件は、不安や恐怖、絶望といった、
負の感情を抱くこと……やはりそれが有力だと思う。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000790_YSHTOLA<tab>If so, then it is not unlike the calamity that befell the ancients.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000790_YSHTOLA……だとしたら、いにしえの時代に起きた終末とも、
共通点が見えてくるわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000800_YSHTOLA<tab>With their creation magicks they unwittingly gave form to untold horrors.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000800_YSHTOLA古代人たちは、創造魔法が暴発し、
意図せず恐怖を具現化していったと言ったでしょう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000810_YSHTOLA<tab>Had they simply lost control, surely it would have manifested in many forms─not all of them monstrous.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000810_YSHTOLA単なる暴発だったら、
必ずしも恐ろしいと思うものばかりが創られないはず。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000820_YSHTOLA<tab>Yet somehow this phenomenon is triggered solely by the darkness in their hearts. A common thread with what we now witness.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000820_YSHTOLAけれど、それもまた、
負の感情とだけ結びつく現象だったとすれば……？
今目の前で起きている災厄と、ひとつの線で繋がるわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000830_ALPHINAUD<tab>...Common, but not identical. While the beasts the ancients faced were forged with magic alone, those of today are born of sentient beings.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000830_ALPHINAUD過去と現在の終末には、相違点もある。
それが創造魔法に現れるか、人や生物そのものに現れるかだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000840_ALPHINAUD<tab>Why remains to be seen, but there is one fundamental difference between us and our predecessors: our souls are sundered, whereas theirs were not.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000840_ALPHINAUD理由はまだわからないが……
古代人と私たちの最大の違いは、
分割された生命であるか否かだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000850_ALPHINAUD<tab>Perhaps that single variable makes all the difference.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000850_ALPHINAUD<tab>そこに何か、効き方の違いのようなものがあるのかもしれない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000860_GRAHATIA<tab>If I may...there was another detail that troubled me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000860_GRAHATIA<tab>それからもうひとつ、気になる証言があったんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000870_GRAHATIA<tab>We have it on good authority that Khalzahl's transformation took place before the skies began to burn.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000870_GRAHATIAカルザールは、空が燃えるよりも前に、
偽神獣に転じていたらしいんだよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000880_ALISAIE<tab>What!? If that's true, then the situation's more dire than we realized.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000880_ALISAIEなんですって……？
それが本当なら、かなりまずいんじゃない？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000890_ALISAIE<tab>It means even if there's no ominous sign presaging the Final Days, anyone─anywhere─has the potential to become a beast.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000890_ALISAIEだって、目に見える終末の現象が起きていなくたって、
獣に転じる可能性があるってことでしょ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000900_ALISAIE<tab>Even in lands we thought safe. Even as we speak...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000900_ALISAIE今は大きな騒ぎが起きていない地域でも、
もしかしたら、もう……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000910_HANNISHMANA<tab>Look, it's the satrap!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000910_HANNISHMANA<tab>見ろ、太守様がいらっしゃったぞ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000920_HANNISHBOYA<tab>The satrap!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000920_HANNISHBOYA<tab>太守様！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000930_HANNISHWOMANA<tab>Thank the heavens...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000930_HANNISHWOMANA<tab>よかった…

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000940_AWAHEEN<tab>My countrymen. I am relieved and heartened to see you strong and safe.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000940_AWAHEEN<tab>皆、本当に、よくぞ無事でいてくれました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000950_AWAHEEN<tab>While the danger has not yet passed─far from it─allow me to assure you that the beasts that raged within the city walls have been exterminated to the last.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000950_AWAHEEN予断を許さない状況ですが、
ひとまず、ラザハン都市内で暴れていた獣は、
すべて排除できたそうです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000960_AWAHEEN<tab>Outside this sanctuary, the brave men and women of the Radiant Host and our dragon ally continue to battle our unholy foes.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000960_AWAHEENほかの村落でも、星戦士団の皆や、
頼もしき味方である竜が奮闘してくれています。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000970_AWAHEEN<tab>I pray these tidings put your minds at ease, and help you calm your hearts. Have faith that we shall soon conquer this terrible trial.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000970_AWAHEENどうか心を落ち着け、慌てることなく、
待機をお願いいたします。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000980_HANNISHOLDWOMANA<tab>Your Excellency...is there any word from Palaka's Stand?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000980_HANNISHOLDWOMANA<tab>太守様、「パーラカの里」はどうなっているのでしょうか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000990_HANNISHOLDWOMANA<tab>My grandson was bound for there yesterday, and I-I worry for his life...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000990_HANNISHOLDWOMANA私の孫が、昨日あの村に出かけたきり、
まだ戻っていないのです……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001000_AWAHEEN<tab>We are still awaiting a report. But I promise you, as soon as I have aught to share...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001000_AWAHEEN私もまだ、報告を待っている状況です。
詳しいことがわかり次第、皆にも共有を……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001010_MATSYA<tab>(-???-)Y-Your Excellency! I bring grave news!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001010_MATSYA(-？？？？-)太守様……！
たた、た、たいへんだす！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001020_AWAHEEN<tab>You are...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001020_AWAHEEN<tab>あなたは……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001030_MATSYA<tab>I...I'm Matsya of Akyaali. A humble fisherman.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001030_MATSYAあ、オ、オラは、アキャーリのマトシャ。
漁師のマトシャだす。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001040_THANCRED<tab>Ah, I remember you from our first visit.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001040_THANCRED<tab>お前は確か、最初にこの島に来たときに会った……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001050_MATSYA<tab>Hm? Wait, you're...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001050_MATSYA<tab>あれ、あんた方どうして……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001060_MATSYA<tab>B-But no, that can wait!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001060_MATSYA<tab>い、いや、今は太守様が先だす！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001070_MATSYA<tab>When the skies turned red, I set off for Palaka's Stand, fearing for the safety of a friend.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001070_MATSYAこんな不気味な空になったもんだから、
オラ、知り合いのことが心配で、
「パーラカの里」に向かったんだす。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001080_MATSYA<tab>But as I drew near the village, I saw dreadful beasts all about.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001080_MATSYAそしたら、里のまわりに、
見たこともない怖ろしい化け物がいっぱいいて……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001090_HANNISHOLDWOMANA<tab>No... Gods have mercy...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001090_HANNISHOLDWOMANA<tab>ああ……そんな……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001100_HANNISHOLDWOMANA<tab>Your Excellency! Save my grandson! I beg of you!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001100_HANNISHOLDWOMANA太守様、どうかすぐに助けを！
孫を救ってください……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001110_AWAHEEN<tab>We will spare no effort to save all we can. But you must remain calm─
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001110_AWAHEENもちろんそうします。
ですから、どうか落ち着いて……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001120_HANNISHOLDWOMANA<tab>Calm!? You tell me to be calm!? You saw those beasts! They tore our bravest warriors limb from limb!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001120_HANNISHOLDWOMANA落ち着いていられますか……！
あの恐ろしい化け物たちは、星戦士団の手練れでも、
簡単に引きちぎっていたんですよ！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001130_HANNISHOLDWOMANA<tab>What if we are too late? If they catch him─sink their fangs into him...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001130_HANNISHOLDWOMANA<tab>孫があれに襲われたら、ひとたまりも……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001140_HANNISHOLDWOMANA<tab>The fangs...the blood...the screams!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001140_HANNISHOLDWOMANA<tab>ああぁ……ヒトたマりモ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001150_YSHTOLA<tab>Get away from her. Now!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001150_YSHTOLA<tab>まずいわ、皆、離れてッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001160_HANNISHOLDWOMANA<tab>Aaagggh! Aaaaaaaaaggghhh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001160_HANNISHOLDWOMANA<tab>あああ、うう、あぁぁぁぁ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001170_HANNISHWOMANA<tab>Nooo! Nooooooooo!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001170_HANNISHWOMANA<tab>い、嫌ぁぁぁぁぁッ！！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001180_THANCRED<tab>...Damn it. We've got to kill them before it spreads!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001180_THANCRED<tab>クソッ、とにかく獣を抑え込む！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001190_YSHTOLA<tab>We'll handle this. See the townspeople to safety!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001190_YSHTOLA<tab>あなたたちは、逃げる人の救援を優先して！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001200_HANNISHMANA<tab>Run! As fast as you can!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001200_HANNISHMANA<tab>逃げるぞ、早く！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001210_HANNISHBOYA<tab>Ah!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001210_HANNISHBOYA<tab>あっ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001220_HANNISHBOYA<tab>Aaah...aaah...no!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001220_HANNISHBOYA<tab>あ……あぁ……や……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001230_HANNISHBOYA<tab>Gaaaaaaghhh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001230_HANNISHBOYA<tab>ワアアアア！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001240_HANNISHBOYA<tab>Faaa...grrraaaaaaghhh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001240_HANNISHBOYA<tab>オトー……サ……ァァ……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001242_AWAHEEN<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001242_AWAHEEN<tab>ハッ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001244_AWAHEEN<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001244_AWAHEEN<tab>ヤッ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001246_AWAHEEN<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001246_AWAHEEN<tab>グアァッ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001250_AWAHEEN<tab>Vrtra... Our people... You must save them!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001250_AWAHEEN<tab>ヴリトラ様を、ラザハンを……どうか……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001260_HANNISHMANA<tab>My son...he...he... The satrap!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001260_HANNISHMANA<tab>あ、お、俺の息子が……太守様が……ッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001270_GRAHATIA<tab>Enough! You must run, for their sake and your own!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001270_GRAHATIAしっかりしろッ！
ふたりのために、あんたは逃げ延びるんだ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001275_HANNISHMANA<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001275_HANNISHMANA<tab>フー

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001280_GRAHATIA<tab>Yes. You will survive. You must.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001280_GRAHATIA<tab>そう、大丈夫……大丈夫だ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001290_GRAHATIA<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001290_GRAHATIA<tab>すー、はぁ…

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001300_GRAHATIA<tab>Be strong, my friends!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001300_GRAHATIA<tab>皆、前を向いて胸を張れ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001310_GRAHATIA<tab>Fear not, for we will defeat these abominations!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001310_GRAHATIA<tab>恐れることはない、この獣は、私たちで打ち倒せる！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001320_GRAHATIA<tab>Brave men and women of the Radiant Host! Lend Y'shtola and Thancred your aid! Let not a single beast escape!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001320_GRAHATIA星戦士団は、ヤ・シュトラとサンクレッドの支援を。
獣をこの広場から出さないことだけ考えろ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001330_GRAHATIA<tab>The rest of you, flee this place! Carry the wounded if you must! Head indoors, or underground!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001330_GRAHATIAほかの者は、近くの者とともに退避だ！
怪我をしている者がいたら手を貸して、
建物の中か、下層に向かうように。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001340_GRAHATIA<tab>Above all, stay calm. No beasts will follow you─we will see to that.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001340_GRAHATIA焦る必要はない。
獣たちに、決して皆を追わせはしないッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001350_THANCRED<tab>Alphinaud! Alisaie! Leave the city to us, and make for Palaka's Stand at once!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001350_THANCREDアルフィノ！　アリゼー！
ここは俺たちで片づける、お前たちは「パーラカの里」に行け！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001360_THANCRED<tab>Matsya, show my friends to the village. I promise you─they're more capable than the Host's finest.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001360_THANCREDマトシャ、そいつらを里まで案内してやってくれ！
必ず力になってくれる！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001370_MATSYA<tab>R-Right!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001370_MATSYA<tab>わ、わかった……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001380_GRAHATIA<tab>Go with them, will you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001380_GRAHATIA<tab>あんたも行ってやってくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001390_GRAHATIA<tab>We will save these people─as many as we can!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001390_GRAHATIA<tab>オレたちで救うんだ……ひとりでも多く！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001400_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Meanwhile, in the skies above Thavnair─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001400_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>一方  サベネア島  上空――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001410_ESTINIEN<tab>No more enemies to trouble us here...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001410_ESTINIEN<tab>飛行型は、あらかた倒せたみたいだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001420_ESTINIEN<tab>...It's me. How fare you below?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001420_ESTINIEN……ああ、俺だ。
そっちの状況はどうなってる？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001430_ESTINIEN<tab>...Understood. I will inform Vrtra.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001430_ESTINIENそうか……。
了解した、ヴリトラにも伝える。
それじゃあな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001440_ESTINIEN<tab>Chaos and panic sweep Radz-at-Han, and many more have succumbed to the transformations.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001440_ESTINIEN一度は落ち着きを見せたラザハンで、
再び、大規模な獣化があったそうだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001450_ESTINIEN<tab>Amidst the fray, Ahewann fell...protecting a grief-stricken father.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001450_ESTINIEN<tab>その最中で、住民をかばって、アヒワーンが死んだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001460_VRITRA<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001460_VRITRA<tab>ああ…

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001470_ESTINIEN<tab>My friends fight alongside your Radiant Host to secure the capital.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001470_ESTINIEN<tab>うちの連中と兵士たちが今、混乱を収めようとしているらしい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001480_ESTINIEN<tab>Beasts have been sighted in Palaka's Stand as well. We have divided our forces in hopes of quelling the threat there.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001480_ESTINIEN一方で、パーラカの里も獣に襲われているという報告があった。
それで、戦力を分けて対応中だそうだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001490_ESTINIEN<tab>Of small solace is that we now know what triggers the transformation. As my companions tell it...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001490_ESTINIENあとは、人が獣に転じる条件にも予測がついたと。
あいつらが言うには……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001500_VRITRA<tab>So it is the very fear and despair in their hearts which inflict this abhorrent punishment upon them...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001500_VRITRA<tab>恐怖や絶望がきっかけとなる……まるで悪夢ではないか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001510_VRITRA<tab>...A nightmare from which my children will never awake. O capricious and cruel fate─they are undeserving of such condemnation...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001510_VRITRAそのくせ覚めもしないとは。
サベネアの子らには、見合う咎などなかろうに……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001520_ESTINIEN<tab>Will you wallow in sorrow or rise to the occasion?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001520_ESTINIENそう思うなら……
あいつらを護りたいのなら、決断すべきじゃないか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001530_ESTINIEN<tab>Radz-at-Han is leaderless. Before he passed, Ahewann sought to reveal the truth to his people. Honor his wishes.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001530_ESTINIENラザハンは今、太守を欠いている。
アヒワーンの望んだとおり、お前の正体を明かすかどうか、
決めるべきときだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001540_VRITRA<tab>To what end? To breed a new conflict between dragon and man?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001540_VRITRA……明かしてどうなる。
所詮、ヒトと竜は違うものだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001550_VRITRA<tab>These claws could reduce thee to shreds with a touch. These jaws, crush thy bones to dust.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001550_VRITRAこの爪は、少しの力でヒトを切り裂く。
この顎もまた、君たちを易々と噛み砕くだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001560_VRITRA<tab>Only through my proxy could I walk with my children. Without him, I am a bringer of fear─no different from the beasts which beleaguer them.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001560_VRITRA関わり合ってこられたのは、ヒトを模した身躯があってこそだ。
そうでなければ、恐怖を与えるだけ……
異形の獣と、なんら変わりはないだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001570_ESTINIEN<tab>Perhaps so...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001570_ESTINIEN<tab>そうだな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001580_ESTINIEN<tab>Only in death were Hraesvelgr and Shiva united. Indeed, whenever man and dragon have come together, death has ever been the inevitable result.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001580_ESTINIEN人と竜は違う。
だからフレースヴェルグと聖女シヴァは、
生きながら添い遂げられなかったと聞く。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001590_ESTINIEN<tab>'Twas our fear of your kind that sparked a nigh-endless war.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001590_ESTINIEN人は竜を畏れて過ちを犯し、
あまりに長い竜詩戦争が始まった……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001600_ESTINIEN<tab>Fear and hate of which Nidhogg drank deep as he laid waste to my homeland.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001600_ESTINIEN<tab>その中で、ニーズヘッグは、俺の故郷を壊滅させた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001610_ESTINIEN<tab>And in turn I took my revenge on his brood. Blood for blood; pain for pain. I thought nothing of theirs─only of mine.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001610_ESTINIEN俺もまた、あいつの眷属を……あらゆる竜を屠った。
人は誰しも、人命を奪うことを悪としながら、
竜の命を奪うことには躊躇がなかったのさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001620_ESTINIEN<tab>And yet...were the chasm between us too vast and too deep, Hraesvelgr would not have borne Ysayle to battle and our rescue.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001620_ESTINIEN……だが、本当にそれだけだったなら、
氷の巫女はフレースヴェルグの背に乗ってこなかった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001630_ESTINIEN<tab>He would have never entrusted a mortal champion with one of his eyes, and the Dragonsong War would still rage on.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001630_ESTINIEN竜の眼を託された英雄が、
竜詩戦争を終結に導くこともなかった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001640_ESTINIEN<tab>And I would still wage a never-ending war of violence and vengeance, the future of our star be damned.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001640_ESTINIEN俺がこの槍を持ち続けていることも、
それを星のために振るうこともなかったはずだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001650_ESTINIEN<tab>I cannot speak for Ahewann's greater goals. Yet I know that he served you─served your people─long and true.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001650_ESTINIEN俺はアヒワーンの考えなんぞわからん。
だが、長年、お前と民を繋ぐ役目を果たしてきたんだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001660_ESTINIEN<tab>In this time of unprecedented crisis, he turned to you. You could do worse than to place your trust in him.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001660_ESTINIENそんな男が、この窮地にこそ願い出たんだ。
あいつは信じていたんじゃないか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001670_ESTINIEN<tab>It will not be easy, but the future of Radz-at-Han hangs in the balance.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001670_ESTINIENお前と民がうまくやっていけることも、
それこそが、ラザハンに明日を引き寄せることも。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001680_ESTINIEN<tab>We have company!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001680_ESTINIEN<tab>新手が来たか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001690_VRITRA<tab>I am ready.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001690_VRITRA<tab>……こちらの準備は万全だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001700_ESTINIEN<tab>The hour is come, Vrtra. It's all or nothing!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001700_ESTINIEN正念場だな、ヴリトラ。
さあ、蹴散らすぞ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001710_ALPHINAUD<tab>Courage, friend. The pain will pass.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001710_ALPHINAUD<tab>大丈夫、じきに痛みも引きます。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001720_MATSYA<tab>Has anyone seen Mehvan?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001720_MATSYA<tab>誰か、メヴァンを見てないだすか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001730_MATSYA<tab>Where could she be...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001730_MATSYA<tab>ここにもいないか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001740_ALISAIE<tab>We've dealt with all the blasphemies...and made certain no villagers are still in hiding.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001740_ALISAIEひとまわりしてきたけど、
もう獣も隠れてる人もいなかったわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001750_ALPHINAUD<tab>Good work. We've otherwise tended to the wounded as best we can.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001750_ALPHINAUDふたりとも、おつかれさま。
手当ての方も終わったところだよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001760_PALAKASMAN<tab>What will become of us?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001760_PALAKASMAN<tab>俺たち、これからどうなるんだ……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001770_PALAKASWOMANA<tab>Help is on the way, surely. We may have to abandon our homes now, but we will return. Someday.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001770_PALAKASWOMANA島の外から、きっと助けがきてくれるよ。
しばらくここには戻れなくなるかもしれないけど、
いつかはまた……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001780_PALAKASMAN<tab>But where can we go? Is anywhere even safe?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001780_PALAKASMAN<tab>ほかの国は無事なのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001790_PALAKASWOMANA<tab>That, I cannot say...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001790_PALAKASWOMANA<tab>それは、わからないけど……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001800_PALAKASWOMANB<tab>Well, I can. Nowhere's safe! Run all you like, but there's no escaping these things!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001800_PALAKASWOMANB二度ともとになんて戻らないわよ！
どこに逃げたって、何もかも手遅れ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001810_PALAKASWOMANB<tab>And even if I could...it's too late for my family!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001810_PALAKASWOMANB<tab>だって、もう……あたしの家族は、みんな……ッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001820_PALAKASWOMANB<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001820_PALAKASWOMANB<tab>うっ、ううう

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001830_ALISAIE<tab>This isn't good. The more they dwell on the tragedy, the more likely we are to lose them, too...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001830_ALISAIEまずいわ……。
どうにか気を紛らわしてもらわないと、
今度はこの人たちが……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001840_MATSYA<tab>My friends! This...this is a place of worship!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001840_MATSYAみ、みんな！
ここは、その、プルシャ寺院だす！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001850_MATSYA<tab>Should your heart quake with sadness, cast your mind to the heavens and remember.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001850_MATSYAだから、あの、本物の神獣様と繋がってて……
つらいことに負けたくなければ、訓えを思い浮かべるんだす！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001860_MATSYA<tab>Remember the teachings of the old gods. Did they not implore us to stand fast when waves of sorrow break against our shores?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001860_MATSYAそう、「神々の最初の訓え」だす！
この島のみんななら、悲しいときや苦しいとき、
いつも唱えてきたはずだす……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001870_PALAKASWOMANA<tab>Know this, my children. There is more ugliness than beauty in this world.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001870_PALAKASWOMANA……産まれし者よ聞け。
生とはただ美しきものにあらず。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001880_PALAKASWOMANA<tab>To live is to suffer. To drink of calamity and drown in anguish. To toil and be tested, always and ever.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001880_PALAKASWOMANA生ける者は苦痛を知り、災難を知り、絶望を知る。
あらゆる辛苦は降りかかり続ける。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001890_PALAKASOLDMAN<tab>'Tis a perilous path you walk. Death lurks in the dark, and is the sole promise that awaits at journey's end.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001890_PALAKASOLDMAN焼けた道を行けど褒賞はなく、
道の傍らにはいつも、死が口を開いている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001900_PALAKASOLDMAN<tab>You will tremble with terror. You will weep tears of anger and despair...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001900_PALAKASOLDMAN<tab>それらはお前を恐れさせ、嘆かせ、苛み、悩ませるだろう……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001910_PALAKASMAN<tab>...But do not avert your eyes. See your life for what it is.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001910_PALAKASMANだが、目を閉じてはならぬ。
かくのごとき生を見据えよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001920_PALAKASMAN<tab>Then will you see how the hardships make you strong.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001920_PALAKASMANお前を打ちのめしている辛苦は、
しかし、お前を弱くはしていない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001930_PALAKASWOMANB<tab>Every doubt reforged as scales for your armor.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001930_PALAKASWOMANB<tab>ひとつひとつが、焼けた鉄に振り下ろされる、鎚に似て……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001940_PALAKASWOMANB<tab>Every agony to temper your blade...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001940_PALAKASWOMANB<tab>お前を、強き……強き剣と、成すだろう……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001950_PALAKASOLDMAN<tab>Thank you, lad. We'd almost forgotten who we are.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001950_PALAKASOLDMANありがとうよ。
こういうときこそ、忘れちゃならんの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001960_PALAKASOLDMAN<tab>My undying gratitude to you as well, my friends.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001960_PALAKASOLDMAN<tab>あなた方も、助けてくださってありがとうございました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001970_PALAKASOLDMAN<tab>You were searching for Mehvan, no? We must return home. I pray you help the boy find his friend.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001970_PALAKASOLDMANまだ、メヴァンが見つかっていないのでしょう？
わしらは里まで帰れますので、
どうか彼女たちを、探してやってください。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001980_ALPHINAUD<tab>Gladly. We dispatched what beasts we could, but the roads are still dangerous. Stay together, and go in safety.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001980_ALPHINAUDわかりました。
道中の獣も掃ってはありますが、くれぐれもお気をつけて。
こんな状況ですから、仲間と離れずにお待ちください。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001990_ALISAIE<tab>That was very impressive, what you did back there. Those words seemed to resonate with your people.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001990_ALISAIEみんなに声をかけてくれて、ありがとう。
さっきのが、あなたたちの大事にしてる教訓なのね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002000_MATSYA<tab>They should. They were the first spoken unto our ancestors by the divinity of legend.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002000_MATSYAそう、知恵と力を持った神獣様が、
人生の最初に授けてくださったという訓えだす。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002010_MATSYA<tab>I'm easily upset, and fish are wont to flee a temperamental hand. So I recite the teachings, over and over, to calm myself.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002010_MATSYAオラは、その、すぐウジウジしちゃうから……
怒られたり、嫌なことがあったり、
不漁のときなんかにも、ずっと繰り返してるんだす。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002020_ALISAIE<tab>They're lovely and inspiring to hear. Though I imagine they were born of great misfortune.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002020_ALISAIEいい言葉だった、私まで強さをもらった気がしたわ。
とても厳しい話でもあったけどね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002030_MATSYA<tab>They are born of life. There's as much bad as good in it─more, many would attest. All the more reason to appreciate the good when you can.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002030_MATSYA生きてみると、実際そんなもんだす。
大変なことの方が多いって最初に訓えてもらえるから、
備えられるし、嬉しいときはたくさん歓べるんだす！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002040_ALPHINAUD<tab>I won't argue with that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002040_ALPHINAUD<tab>なるほど、そのとおりかもしれないね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002050_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)In darkness seek joy. Surrender not to sadness, and see beyond despair. Walk free, and bear the light for others to follow.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002050_HYDAELYN(-ハイデリン-)暗闇のうちに、歓びを探すのです。
絶望に目を凝らし、哀しみを掻き分け、
前へと歩み続けた者だけが、その真なる輝きを得る……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002060_ALISAIE<tab>And with that, let us see if we can't find Mehvan.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002060_ALISAIEさあて、気合も入ったことだし、
引き続きメヴァンさんを探さないと……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002070_ALISAIE<tab>Did you see!? That beast was chasing someone!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002070_ALISAIE<tab>今のは……誰かが追われてた……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002080_MATSYA<tab>That's her... No, I'm...I'm sure of it! Mehvan!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002080_MATSYAあれは……
遠いけど間違いない、メヴァンだす！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002090_MEHVAN<tab>Don't, please!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002090_MEHVAN<tab>来ないで……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002095_MEHVAN<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002095_MEHVAN<tab>フッ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002100_ALISAIE<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002100_ALISAIE<tab>くっ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002110_MEHVAN<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002110_MEHVAN<tab>ガッ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002120_MATSYA<tab>No...gods have mercy!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002120_MATSYA<tab>ああ……そんな……ッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002130_ALISAIE<tab>She's so cold, Alphinaud...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002130_ALISAIE<tab>ダメ、身体が冷たいままだわ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002140_ALPHINAUD<tab>The child is alert, and I see no wounds. And yet, she grows weaker...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002140_ALPHINAUD外傷はない……意識も戻っている……。
ただ、生命力が低下してるんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002150_ALPHINAUD<tab>My spells can do no more. What she needs is a change of clothes and a warm bed. We must hurry back!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002150_ALPHINAUDこれ以上は治癒魔法をかけるよりも、
里に戻って着替えや手当てをした方がいい。
急ごう……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002160_ALPHINAUD<tab>Not now...!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002160_ALPHINAUD<tab>こんなときに……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002170_ALISAIE<tab>Matsya, take the child!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002170_ALISAIE<tab>マトシャ、この子を預かって。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002180_ALPHINAUD<tab>Godsdammit, it appears we've made enough noise to be heard for malms around. More will be upon us ere long.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002180_ALPHINAUD……この遺跡の周辺に潜んでいた獣が、
騒ぎでこちらに気づいたか。
とすれば、まだ増える可能性もある。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002190_ALPHINAUD<tab>We make our stand here. Matsya, can you take her back to the village?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002190_ALPHINAUD時間がない……。
マトシャ、君はその子を連れて里まで走れるかい？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002200_MATSYA<tab>Th-The child? All...all by myself!? You can't be serious!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002200_MATSYAそ、そりゃあできなくもないけど、
オラひとりでなんて、そんな……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002210_ALISAIE<tab>The beasts will follow you home unless we stop them here─and so we shall.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002210_ALISAIE獣を引き連れて里の方へはいけないわ。
こいつらは、私たちがここで必ず倒す。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002220_ALISAIE<tab>Be strong, Matsya! Her life is in your hands!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002220_ALISAIEだからあなたも……
勇気を出して、その子を救って！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002230_MATSYA<tab>R-Right! I...I can do it!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002230_MATSYAわ、わかった！
オラ、先に里へ戻る……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002240_ALISAIE<tab>I know you can! We'll keep them busy, Matsya. Go─quickly!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002240_ALISAIEそれじゃあ、私たちで隙を作る。
行って、マトシャ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002250_MATSYA<tab><huff> <puff>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002250_MATSYA<tab>ハァ、ハァ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002260_MATSYA<tab>Steady... You know the way...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002260_MATSYA<tab>落ち着け……怖がっちゃダメだす……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002270_MATSYA<tab>No, no! Not you, too...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002270_MATSYAそんな！
ああ、どうすれば……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002280_MATSYA<tab>Don't be afraid. Don't be afraid...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002280_MATSYA<tab>怖くない……怖くない……怖くない……ッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002290_MATSYA<tab>To live is to suffer. To drink of calamity...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002290_MATSYA<tab>生ける者は苦痛を知り、災難を知り……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002300_MATSYA<tab>'Tis a perilous path... Death...lurks in the dark...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002300_MATSYA<tab>道の傍らにはいつも、死が口を開いている……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002310_MATSYA<tab>Aie!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002310_MATSYA<tab>ひっ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002320_MATSYA<tab>N-No! I'm not afraid! I'm not afraid!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002320_MATSYA<tab>い、嫌だ……怖くない！　怖くない！　怖くないってば！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002330_MATSYA<tab>Uwaaaaaah!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002330_MATSYA<tab>うわああああッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002340_MATSYA<tab>Do not avert your eyes. See...see your life for what it is...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002340_MATSYAお前を打ちのめしている辛苦は……
しかし、お前を弱くはしていない……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002350_MATSYA<tab>See how the hardships make you strong. Every doubt reforged...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002350_MATSYA焼けた鉄に振り下ろされる鎚に似て、
お前を、強き剣と……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002360_MATSYA<tab>Every...agony...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002360_MATSYA<tab>強き……剣と…………

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002370_MATSYA<tab>Ah─!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002370_MATSYA<tab>あぁ…

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002380_MATSYA<tab>Huh?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002380_MATSYA<tab>え……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002390_MATSYA<tab>The divinity...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002390_MATSYA<tab>かみさま……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002400_VRITRA<tab>...Nay. But one who would deliver thee just the same.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002400_VRITRA……いいや。
だが、君たちを護る者だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002410_MATSYA<tab>Please... You must save the child!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002410_MATSYA<tab>助けて……この子を助けてあげてください……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002420_MATSYA<tab>She is all that remains of Mehvan and Qerasaf. Please!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002420_MATSYA<tab>ケラシャフとメヴァンの、大事な、大事な子なんだ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002430_ESTINIEN<tab>Well, well. Seems the babe's taken a liking to you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002430_ESTINIEN<tab>どうやら、そんなチビでも、お前が何だかわかるらしいな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002440_VRITRA<tab>Thou art strong, little one. Let us convey thee to thy home.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002440_VRITRAよくがんばってくれた。
ひとまず、パーラカの里まで送ろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002450_ESTINIEN<tab>Phew...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002450_ESTINIEN<tab>フッ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002460_ESTINIEN<tab>I spied our friends as we flew in...they appeared to be holding their own against the horde.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002460_ESTINIENとなれば、あとは相棒たちだが……
まあ、空から見たあの様子なら、俺が出るまでもなさそうだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002470_ALISAIE<tab>Right. That's the last of them. We should hurry and find Matsya...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002470_ALISAIEこれで、ここは片づいたわね。
急いでマトシャを追いかけないと……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I have a feeling he'll be fine.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>多分、大丈夫だと思う

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>He had help. From on high.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>空から降っていくのが見えた

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002480_ALISAIE<tab>Really? How can you be so sure?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002480_ALISAIE<tab>どういうこと？　追わなくていいの？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002490_ALISAIE<tab>What, like divine aid...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002490_ALISAIE<tab>空からって……何が？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002500_ESTINIEN<tab>A fine battle it must have been. Shame I missed it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002500_ESTINIEN<tab>よう、ずいぶんと盛況だったみたいだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002510_ALPHINAUD<tab>Estinien! It was you who came to Matsya's aid?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002510_ALPHINAUDエスティニアン！
そうか、君がマトシャの援護を？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002520_ESTINIEN<tab>I was only along for the ride─Vrtra was the one who saw the boy was in need. The two are headed back to the village.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002520_ESTINIENこっちの助けに向かおうって決めたのも、
走っていくあいつを見つけたのも、ヴリトラだ。
今は、里まで送り届けてる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002530_ALPHINAUD<tab>Where the wyrm will honor Ahewann's wishes and finally reveal himself to his people...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002530_ALPHINAUDヴリトラが人の前に……。
彼は、大きな決断をしたのだね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002540_ESTINIEN<tab>Perhaps so. Will you go and join them?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002540_ESTINIENまあな。
お前たちも、このまま合流するか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002550_ALISAIE<tab>There's something I need to do first.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002550_ALISAIE<tab>待って、そのまえにひとつだけ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002560_ALISAIE<tab>Mehvan gave her life so that her child might live. She deserves better than to be left to drift alone.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002560_ALISAIE……メヴァンさんを引き上げてあげたいの。
しっかり抱いていてくれたおかげで、
赤ちゃん、大丈夫だったって言ってあげなきゃ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002570_ALISAIE<tab>She deserves to be laid to rest beside her husband, at least. Will you help me?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002570_ALISAIEそれで、せめて遺体を旦那さんのところに……。
手伝ってもらっても、いい？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002580_HANNISHMANB<tab>Look! Someone's coming!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002580_HANNISHMANB<tab>おい、誰か出てきたぞ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002590_VARSHAHN<tab>People of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han. It warms my heart to see so many brave, resilient souls before me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002590_VARSHAHN<tab>みなさん、よくお集まりくださいました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002600_VARSHAHN<tab>Today, I would share with you a great revelation. But before I do, I must make a humble request...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002600_VARSHAHN今日は、すべてのラザハンの民に、大切な話があります。
……それにあたって、ひとつ、お願いをさせてください。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002610_VARSHAHN<tab>Do not be alarmed, nor avert your eyes. See the one I unveil for who he is, and know that he means you no harm.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002610_VARSHAHNこれより現れる者を、どうか恐れないでほしい。
決して、みなさんを傷つけるものではないのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002620_HANNISHMANB<tab>Very well. I daresay it can't be worse than the horrors we've already seen.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002620_HANNISHMANBわかった。
こんな状況だ、今更誰が出てこようが驚かねぇよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002630_VARSHAHN<tab>...Many thanks.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002630_VARSHAHN<tab>ありがとう……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002640_HANNISHOLDWOMANB<tab>A dragon!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002640_HANNISHOLDWOMANB<tab>竜だわ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002650_HANNISHBOYB<tab>Wow!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002650_HANNISHBOYB<tab>すげーっ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002660_VRITRA<tab>People of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han. I am Vrtra, and for years uncounted hath this isle served as mine abode.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002660_VRITRAラザハンの皆よ、私はヴリトラ……
いにしえよりこの島に棲む竜だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002670_VRITRA<tab>'Tis as the satrap's ally I am known. Today, I would reveal the truth unto you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002670_VRITRA私を、太守の盟友として知る者も少なくないだろう。
そのことについて、真実を今、明かしたい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002680_GRAHATIA<tab>Let us hope they accept him.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002680_GRAHATIA<tab>受け入れてもらえるといいな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002690_HANNISHMANB<tab>If I am hearing this right, you were the satrap all along!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002690_HANNISHMANBすると、あんたが、
建国以来の本当の太守様だったってことか……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002700_HANNISHBOYB<tab>Varshahn─ I mean, Master Vrtra... D-Does your divine eye really see all?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002700_HANNISHBOYBヴァルシャン……じゃなくてヴリトラ様は、
やっぱり、真眼でなんでもお見通しなのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002710_VRITRA<tab>...Nay, child. While mine eye hath borne witness to the whole of our nation's history, to its future I am blind as thee.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002710_VRITRA……いいや、私はラザハンのすべての歴史を見てきたが、
その未来まで見通せるわけではない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002720_VRITRA<tab>Countrymen. Calamity the likes of which we have never known is come to Thavnair. Our home.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002720_VRITRA<tab>我らがサベネア島は、今、未曽有の災厄に脅かされている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002730_VRITRA<tab>Friends and loved ones have been taken from us. I, too, have lost my closest confidant.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002730_VRITRA皆はいちじつにして友を、仲間を、愛する者を喪い、
私もまた、民と良き理解者を喪った……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002740_VRITRA<tab>Ahewann loved this land, and served it with dignity till his dying breath. A nobler satrap there will never be.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002740_VRITRA彼は……アヒワーンは、本当に真摯な男だった。
ラザハンを愛し、偽りなく太守であった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002750_VRITRA<tab>For so long, I lacked the courage to face you. I will not easily earn your trust─this I know.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002750_VRITRA今日まで皆の前に姿を現すことさえできなかった私が、
彼ほどの信頼を得ることは難しいだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002760_VRITRA<tab>And yet, I cannot sit idly by and abandon Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han to her fate.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002760_VRITRA<tab>しかし、私は、ラザハンをここで終わらせたくはない……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002770_VRITRA<tab>A font of boundless vibrancy, this jewel of the ocean. Since time immemorial hath she glittered with every color imaginable.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002770_VRITRAあの市の賑わいや、行き交うヒトの活気。
街の彩りは、ここに生きた者たちが、
時と世代を超えて塗り重ねてきたものだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002780_VRITRA<tab>To this dragon slumbering in his dark lair, 'twas a mesmerizing sight─and one that brought no end of joy to my heart.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002780_VRITRAひとり暗い洞窟で眠ってきた私にとって、
それはとても奇妙で、強烈で……鮮やかな歓びだった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002790_VRITRA<tab>This calamity hath stolen too much from you already. Yet so long as you live, the light of Radz-at-Han will never be extinguished.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002790_VRITRAこの災厄ですでに多くのものを失くしたが、
君たちが生きているかぎり、
多彩なる都、ラザハンは続くのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002800_VRITRA<tab>I pray you let me watch over it...over you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002800_VRITRA<tab>私にそれを、君たちを護らせてくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002810_VRITRA<tab>And lend me your strength, that we might face this trial and those to come as one.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002810_VRITRAそして、見通すことさえできないこの難局を乗り切るために、
どうか皆の力を貸してほしい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002820_HANNISHOLDWOMANB<tab>I do not know you, dragon. But I thank you for speaking the truth to us.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002820_HANNISHOLDWOMANBヴリトラ様、真実を話してくださって、
ありがとうございました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002830_HANNISHOLDWOMANB<tab>As divinities both Manusya and Mrga once joined together, so too do I believe that, hand in hand, we can overcome this ordeal, and welcome an era of peace.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002830_HANNISHOLDWOMANB私たちなら、きっと苦難を越えられます。
人たるマヌシャの神々と、獣たるムリガの神々があわさって、
平和な時代が創られたように……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002840_ALPHINAUD<tab>...A sight that would have surely brought a smile to Ysayle's face.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002840_ALPHINAUD<tab>この光景をイゼルが見たなら、きっと喜んだことだろうね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002850_ESTINIEN<tab>...Indeed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002850_ESTINIEN<tab>…………かもな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002860_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Excuse me, but I must speak with the satrap at once.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002860_FOURCHENAULT<tab>……失礼、太守殿はおられるか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002870_ALISAIE<tab>Father!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002870_ALISAIE<tab>お父様……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002880_FOURCHENAULT<tab>You have suffered dearly of late. Yet you must endeavor to look beyond these losses to the future you yet have.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002880_FOURCHENAULT皆、此度の災厄で、お力落としのことと存じ上げる。
しかし、どうか気を強く持っていただきたい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002890_FOURCHENAULT<tab>On behalf of the Forum of Sharlayan, I come with a proposal by which you, the people of Radz-at-Han, might be saved.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002890_FOURCHENAULT私はシャーレアンの哲学者議会を代表し、
ラザハンの人々を救うすべを提示しにきたのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002900_FOURCHENAULT<tab>I say again, I must speak with your satrap. I beseech you─take me to him with all possible haste.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002900_FOURCHENAULT火急の事態にて、予告もなく申し訳ない。
だが、一刻も早く太守殿に取り次いではいただけないだろうか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002910_VRITRA<tab>I am satrap here. Speak thy proposal. All present shall hear and judge.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002910_VRITRA今は、私が太守だ。
用件を聞かせてもらおう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002920_FOURCHENAULT<tab>If I have given offense, then I apologize. First, allow me to share with you what knowledge we have of the phenomenon responsible for your woes: the Final Days.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002920_FOURCHENAULT……これはとんだご無礼を。
では改めて貴殿に、この「終末」と呼ばれる災厄について、
お伝えいたしましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002930_FOURCHENAULT<tab>'Tis an affliction of stagnancy and rot sown into the currents of the star. Though the first prominent manifestation was here in Thavnair, it will invariably spread to every corner of the world.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002930_FOURCHENAULT終末は星のすべてを蝕む病のようなもの。
不幸にもサベネア島の周辺が最初の事例となり、
今後、被害は世界全土へと拡大していくでしょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002940_FOURCHENAULT<tab>The Forum was forewarned of this apocalypse several centuries ago.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002940_FOURCHENAULT哲学者議会は、遡ること数百年前、
この災厄についての予言を聞いた……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002950_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Thenceforth, my predecessors sought to prepare for the end times in the only conceivable fashion: by securing a means of escape.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002950_FOURCHENAULT以来、終末がすべてを呑み込む日に備え、
この星から脱出する計画を進めてきたのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002960_HANNISHMANB<tab>Escape the star? What madness is this!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002960_HANNISHMANB星からの脱出だと！？
そ、そんな馬鹿げたこと……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002970_FOURCHENAULT<tab>'Tis by no means madness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002970_FOURCHENAULT<tab>決して夢物語などではない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002980_FOURCHENAULT<tab>With the coming of the Seventh Umbral Calamity, the true nature of the red moon Dalamud was revealed─that it was an artificial construct of ancient Allag.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002980_FOURCHENAULTエオルゼアにおける第七霊災を機に、
赤き月とされていたダラガブが、
古代アラグ文明の遺産だと知った方も多いはず。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002990_FOURCHENAULT<tab>But what of the silver moon?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002990_FOURCHENAULT<tab>なれば、白き月は？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003000_FOURCHENAULT<tab>This celestial satellite is yet another technological marvel fashioned and maintained by ancient allies. A ship that will sail the heavens and deliver our people from destruction.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003000_FOURCHENAULTあれこそが、我々の同胞によって築かれた切り札……
我々や貴殿らを終末から救い出す、天往く船なのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003010_FOURCHENAULT<tab>And by our people, I speak not only of Sharlayan. We mean to save every man, woman, and child it is within our power to save.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003010_FOURCHENAULTシャーレアンは、船を独占したりはしない。
世界中の人々を、可能なかぎり救いたいと考えています。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003020_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Including you, our dear friends of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han. Recent events necessitate adjustments be made, and quickly, but we can and will escort you safely to the moon.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003020_FOURCHENAULTかねてより親交が深い、ラザハンの皆様も然り。
急場につき、いくらか例外の対応は必要になりましょうが、
必ずや月へお送りいたしましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003030_VRITRA<tab>Long has thy Forum been allies to Thavnair. I trust thou dost not extend this offer lightly.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003030_VRITRA……哲学者議会との付き合いは短くない。
君たちが断言するのだから、世迷言ではないのだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003040_VRITRA<tab>Yet I wonder...is this truly the way? Is there a future to be built for us beyond this star our father deemed the last bastion of hope?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003040_VRITRAしかし、その選択、本当に分があるのか？
我が父に「最後に残った希望」と言わしめたこの星を捨て、
皆の未来を築ける算段が？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003050_FOURCHENAULT<tab>It is for that very reason I come before you and your people. To answer any and all of your questions. To offer my assurances and allay your fears.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003050_FOURCHENAULTそれをご説明するために、こうして私が参ったのです。
答えられる疑問には、すべてお答えしましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003060_FOURCHENAULT<tab>...Though if you wish the best for your people, I advise you to render your decision swiftly.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003060_FOURCHENAULTもっとも、民のためを思うのであれば、
迷っておられる時間はないかと存じますが。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003070_VRITRA<tab>Show our friends to Meghaduta. They are to be received as honored guests.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003070_VRITRA……彼らをメーガドゥータ宮へ。
客人として、丁重に案内してほしい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003080_VRITRA<tab>Worry not. Whatever decision is reached, your paths shall be yours to decide.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003080_VRITRA<tab>大丈夫、君たちが望む道を選べるような決断をしよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003090_VRITRA<tab>Until then, heed the warning of these brave heroes─guard your hearts against fear and despair, for it is within such fertile soil that the seeds of blasphemy find purchase.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003090_VRITRA私とアヒワーンが信頼を寄せる者たちによれば、
獣への変化を引き起こすのは、不安や絶望といった心らしい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003100_VRITRA<tab>Remain calm and attend to your daily tasks. I shall return anon.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003100_VRITRAだからどうか案じずに、
できることなら普段どおりに過ごしながら、
連絡を待ってほしい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003110_HANNISHBOYB<tab>We'll do as you say, Master Vrtra. We believe in you!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003110_HANNISHBOYB……わかったよ。
がんばってね、ヴリトラ様。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003120_NIDHANA<tab>Oh, you're still here! What a relief!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003120_NIDHANA<tab>あっ、よかった、まだいてくれて！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003130_ALISAIE<tab>Nidhana? What's the matter? Has something happened at Palaka's Stand?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003130_ALISAIEニッダーナ？
どうしたの、まさかまたパーラカの里が……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003140_NIDHANA<tab>Oh, no! Not that I know of. I'd just hoped to hear your thoughts on a theory of mine.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003140_NIDHANAううん、そうじゃなくて、
ちょっと思いついたことがあって確かめにきたの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003150_NIDHANA<tab>All who undergo the transformation are drained of their aether, yes? What is it, then, that gives these beasts the strength to carry on as they do?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003150_NIDHANA人が獣に転じるとき、エーテルが消失する……
なら、あの獣はなんで活動できているのかって、考えてたんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003160_NIDHANA<tab>Logically, they must be drawing upon an alternate form of vital energy. That put me in mind of our earlier conversation, when I tried to explain the essence which many confuse with aether.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003160_NIDHANA単純に考えれば、エーテルに代わる活力があるはず。
そのときふとね、最近キミたちと、
エーテルとは異なる力の話をしたなって思い出したんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003170_YSHTOLA<tab>Akasa... Yes, I remember. The unseen gift bestowed from on high...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003170_YSHTOLA確か……アーカーシャ、だったかしら。
目には見えない、天より下りし力……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003180_YSHTOLA<tab>An energy influenced solely by emotion!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003180_YSHTOLA<tab>想いが動かす力……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003190_NIDHANA<tab>Yes, yes. In this instance, negative ones set akasa into motion, thereby infusing the beasts with vitality. I posit this is the mechanism by which the beasts are born and sustained.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003190_NIDHANAそう、負の感情によってアーカーシャが動かされ、
人を獣に変えたり、エーテルもなしに活動させてる……
そんな可能性もあるんじゃないかって。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003200_NIDHANA<tab>Ah─do you still have that flower?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003200_NIDHANA<tab>ねえ、まだあの花を持ってる？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003210_NIDHANA<tab>If we accept that it once shone bright by drawing upon akasa influenced by the thoughts of those nearby...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003210_NIDHANA……その花が、
周囲の人の想いによって動いたアーカーシャを捉え、
それによって輝きを変えていたのだとしたら。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003220_NIDHANA<tab>Then fear, terror, despair─negative emotions so powerful as to suffocate it─permeated the air in this place.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003220_NIDHANA存在が耐えきれないほどの強烈な力が、
ここに渦巻いていたんじゃないかな。
不安や恐怖、絶望を呼び水としてね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003230_NIDHANA<tab>You must be very careful. The forces which drive the Final Days may be beyond our ability to perceive.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003230_NIDHANA気をつけて……。
終末は、アタシたちの触れられる理の外にある現象かもしれない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003240_NIDHANA<tab>Sorry...I didn't mean to scare you like that. At any rate, I will continue my research into akasa.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003240_NIDHANAって、脅かすみたいでよくなかったね。
アーカーシャについては、アタシも引き続き調べてみるよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003250_NIDHANA<tab>Do temper your expectations, however. There are sadly few detailed studies upon which I may draw.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003250_NIDHANA前も言ったとおり、具体的な研究はされてこなかったから、
成果は期待できないかもしれないけど……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003260_YSHTOLA<tab>Formulating a new theory, as you have, is itself no small feat. I wish you well in your endeavors, and pray you take care.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003260_YSHTOLAこうして可能性に気づけただけでも十分な進歩よ。
あなたも錬金術師たちも、身の安全を最優先にね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003270_NIDHANA<tab>Thank you. You stay safe as well, yes? Till next we meet─and we will meet again!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003270_NIDHANAありがとう。
みんなこそ、くれぐれも気をつけて。
次会うときも、お互いに無事で……ね！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003280_YSHTOLA<tab>So blasphemies now plague all the realm...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003280_YSHTOLA<tab>そう……各地にも偽神獣が……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003290_ALPHINAUD<tab>It will only get worse, if what Father said is true. As it did in Amaurot...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003290_ALPHINAUD父が説明していたとおり、
これから被害が拡大していくのかもしれないね……。
アーモロートで知った、過去の終末もそうだった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003300_THANCRED<tab>If that's our model, then shouldn't we expect the effects to grow more severe as it feeds off its own spread?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003300_THANCREDあれに倣うなら、範囲の広がりに加えて、
現象がさらに悪化する可能性もあるんじゃないか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003310_THANCRED<tab>As if people transforming into those monstrosities wasn't bad enough, if the flora and fauna─if the land itself turned against us...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003310_THANCRED人が異形に転じるってだけでも悪夢だが、
変化が多くの動植物や大地そのものに及べば、
さすがに居続けるのは難しくなる……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003320_ESTINIEN<tab>...No one would survive.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003320_ESTINIEN<tab>……いよいよ住めない星になるってわけか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003330_MIHLEEL<tab>Here's your order, friend.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003330_MIHLEEL<tab>ご注文の品をお持ちしました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003340_MIHLEEL<tab>May you find comfort in these dark times.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003340_MIHLEEL<tab>こんな状況ですけど、ごゆっくり……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003350_ALISAIE<tab>Where do we go from here?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003350_ALISAIE<tab>……私たち、どうするべきなのかしら。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003360_ALISAIE<tab>If there's one thing we've learned, fighting blindly and simply reacting to what comes will accomplish nothing.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003360_ALISAIE今回、終末を目の当たりにして、
闇雲に戦うだけじゃダメだって思い知ったわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003370_ALISAIE<tab>We must find a solution that addresses the fundamental cause. Before our strength is exhausted. Before this crisis spirals out of control!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003370_ALISAIEどうにかして根本的な解決をしないと、
その場しのぎのやりかたじゃ、すぐに限界がくる。
被害が拡大していくならなおさらね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003380_ALISAIE<tab>Is there something...anything we've overlooked?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003380_ALISAIE<tab>何か……何かないのかしら……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003390_YSHTOLA<tab>If there is an answer, Hydaelyn Herself will have it. 'Twas She who bound Zodiark and forestalled the Final Days.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003390_YSHTOLA鍵を持っているとしたら、過去の終末を知り、
ゾディアークを保持することで終末を防いでいた、
ハイデリンなのでしょうけれど……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003400_YSHTOLA<tab>Alas, we have heard naught from Her since the Tower of Babil. Whether She cannot or will not speak, I can only speculate...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003400_YSHTOLAバブイルの塔の一件以来、彼女からの接触はなし。
「できない」のか「しない」のかさえ、窺い知れないわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003410_YSHTOLA<tab>Even the flower She gave us is no more...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003410_YSHTOLA<tab>標として託された花も、消えてなくなってしまった……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003420_WATCHEROFMOON<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>In our time, we called it “Elpis”... You would do well to remember the name.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003420_WATCHEROFMOON覚えておくといい。
その花は、我々の時代には「エルピス」と呼ばれていた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003430_YSHTOLA<tab>So advised the watcher...but what could be the significance of that name? It is entirely unfamiliar to me.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003430_YSHTOLA確かに、月の監視者はそう言っていたわね。
エルピス……私には心当たりがない言葉だわ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003440_ALPHINAUD<tab>To me as well. It meant something to the ancients, though. “In <var 1A 02 /var>our<var 1A 01 /var> time...”
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003440_ALPHINAUD残念ながら私もだ。
「我々の時代には」と言っていたということは、
古代人たちの言葉だということになるのかな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003450_YSHTOLA<tab>Most surely. Yet I do not recall a single mention of it in the records of Anyder.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003450_YSHTOLAそうでしょうね。
ただ、アニドラスの記録を閲覧していたときにも、
聞いた覚えはないわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003460_ALISAIE<tab>Another dead end, and quite literally. It's not as if there are any ancients living we could go and ask...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003460_ALISAIEじゃあ、この線で追うのも無理ってこと？
古代人の生きた時代のことなんて、聞ける人もいないし……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003470_GRAHATIA<tab>Not alive as such...but not quite dead...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003470_GRAHATIA<tab>いや……ひとりだけ、いるかもしれない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003480_GRAHATIA<tab>...Elidibus.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003480_GRAHATIA<tab>……エリディブスだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003490_GRAHATIA<tab>I sealed him in the white auracite of the Crystal Tower, back on the First.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003490_GRAHATIAオレは白聖石に代えて、
第一世界のクリスタルタワーに彼を封じ込めた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003500_GRAHATIA<tab>Contained within that reservoir of aether that maintains it─aether that is returned little by little to the sea...naught may remain of his soul.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003500_GRAHATIAあの塔に込められたエーテルは、
機能の維持なんかに使われ、少しずつ星海に還ってる。
……だから、彼の魂ももう、そこにはいないかもしれない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003510_GRAHATIA<tab>However, if part of it lingers...we might be able to speak with him there.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003510_GRAHATIAでも、もしまだ留まっているとしたら……
話せる可能性もあるんじゃないか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003520_GRAHATIA<tab>I─no, we can no longer make that journey. But you, my friend, still can.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003520_GRAHATIAオレは……オレたちはもう、それを確かめには行けない。
でも、あんたなら、再び第一世界に渡ることができる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>It's worth a try.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>その可能性に賭けてみよう！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>It would be an opportunity to look in on the others as well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>ついでにみんなの様子も見てくる

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_A2_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>If there is truly no other way...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_A2_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>ほかに打つ手がないのなら……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003530_GRAHATIA<tab>Yes, we can but act and hope for the best!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003530_GRAHATIA<tab>ああ、行動あるのみだ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003540_GRAHATIA<tab>Thank you, my friend. That would mean much to me.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003540_GRAHATIAありがとう……。
あんたがそうしてくれるなら、何より安心だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003550_GRAHATIA<tab>I understand your trepidation, but there is merit in making the journey regardless. You could see with your own eyes whether the First, too, faces its Final Days.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003550_GRAHATIA不確かな案ですまない。
終末が第一世界に影響しているかも確認できるから、
無駄足にはならないはずだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003560_THANCRED<tab>If nothing else, should we learn the First is safe, we'll have that much more reason to keep fighting the good fight.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003560_THANCRED俺としても、願ったり叶ったりだ。
少なくとも今は第一世界が無事であること、
それがわかれば、踏ん張り甲斐もあるからな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003570_THANCRED<tab>That said...the odds are not in our favor, to say the least.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003570_THANCREDそこで糸口が掴めるか否か……
どうあれ、俺たちが乗ってるのは相当に分の悪い賭けだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003580_THANCRED<tab>Which is why we're fortunate to have Urianger up there on the moon, working hard to make all the necessary preparations for our departure, should it come to it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003580_THANCREDだが、ウリエンジェが月にいる。
あいつは、本当にそれしか道がないと判断したら、
最善を尽くして地上の命を引き上げるだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003590_ALISAIE<tab>...And why we have nothing to lose by staying the course till the last instant!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003590_ALISAIE<tab>だったら私たちは、その瞬間まで、俯かずに抗うだけだわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003600_YSHTOLA<tab>Indeed. To the last, let us all do what we can.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003600_YSHTOLAええ……。
こちらに残る方も、やれることをやりましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003610_YSHTOLA<tab>I will consult with Master Matoya and see if she knows of a way to reach Hydaelyn from the aetherial sea.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003610_YSHTOLA私はマトーヤにもう一度連絡をとって、
星海からハイデリンに接触できないか試みてみるわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003620_ALPHINAUD<tab>And I will visit the nations' leaders and attempt to ascertain how far the Final Days have progressed elsewhere.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003620_ALPHINAUDであれば私は、各国と協力して、
終末の正確な状況を把握できるようにしよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003630_ESTINIEN<tab>Keep me abreast of your findings. I can seek out and slay the worst of the immediate threats, if only to slow the spread.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003630_ESTINIENその情報をこっちに回せ。
一時しのぎだろうが、倒せる獣は倒しておく。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003640_ALPHINAUD<tab>Unease, terror, despair... Try as we might to suppress them, these emotions will return to harry us time and time again.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003640_ALPHINAUD不安や恐怖、それに絶望……
どれだけ遠ざけようとしても、
そういう気持ちは湧きだしてくるだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003650_ALPHINAUD<tab>But when they do, remember this...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003650_ALPHINAUD<tab>けれど、忘れないでいてほしい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003660_ALPHINAUD<tab>Your friends and loved ones are out there, somewhere, sharing in your struggle. You are not alone.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003660_ALPHINAUDここにいる仲間が、どこかで戦い続けている。
私たちは、決して独りにはならない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003670_EMETSELCH<tab>So ends the brief respite before the next revelation.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003670_EMETSELCHひとときの休息は過ぎ去り
ついにそのときが来る

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003680_EMETSELCH<tab>Yes, so much left for you to see...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003680_EMETSELCH<tab>さあ  すべてを明かしに行くがいい――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003690_EMETSELCH<tab>Where beginning ends, and end begins...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003690_EMETSELCH<tab>終わりを巡る  始まりの地へ
